transcripts: Hi, I'm Jessica for campus and beyond from Bed Bath and Beyond. And I'm Nicole. I'm incoming freshman Jess has been helping me set up my new room. Jess it's so hot in here though; aren't you hot? Yeah it's had to control the temperature in your room when you can't control the thermostat but that's why you have to come prepared. With what? my own personal air conditioner. No a fan. I mean you need a floor fan and a desk fan to keep it cool in here or you can have a portable fan. This one has a chord and batteries so you can carry it where ever you need to. Hey that's pretty nice. Oh and please tell me you have something lighter than this comforter. Oh yeah I have this lightweight blanket here. The comforter is only to make it look nice. In a couple months you're gonna wish it was hotter. I know hard to imagine right now. Trust me these rooms get pretty chili but it's so easy to get cozy and you're halfway there with this comforter. Yeah It is pretty comfy. And the blanket will be good as an extra layer when it gets really cold. Perfect, I use this cuddly throw for wrap it around me when I'm studying or for an extra layer at night. Yeah and I got flannel sheets too. I just hate being cold. Hey you know what let me share this thing.
